sentence.Network_en: People with disabilities are now doing many things to enrich their lives.
sentence.Network_cn: 残疾人士如今做很多事情来丰富他们的生活。

sentence.Network_en: He will drain, rather than enrich, the country.
sentence.Network_cn: 他会耗尽而不是增加该国的财富。

sentence.Network_en: The farmers ploughed the vegetable leaves back to enrich the soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 农夫们把蔬菜叶犁入土中作肥料.

list.abs: 有营养物质的培养基 3)加富培养基和富集培养基(enrichment medium) 在普通培养基(如肉汤蛋白胨培养基)加入某些特殊营养物质制成的一类营养丰富的培养基称加富.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'make wealthy'): from Old French enrichir, from en- 'in' + riche 'rich'

entry.def: To enrich something means to improve its quality, usually by adding something to it.

example.ex: An extended family enriches life in many ways...
example.tran: 大家庭在很多方面会使生活更加丰富多彩。

example.ex: It is important to enrich the soil prior to planting.
example.tran: 在种植前给土壤增肥很重要。

entry.def: To enrich someone means to increase the amount of money that they have.

example.ex: He will drain, rather than enrich, the country...
example.tran: 他会耗尽而不是增加该国的财富。

example.ex: Those who know how to use the system can enrich themselves at the expense of the very people who work for those companies.
example.tran: 那些懂得如何利用现行体制的人使自己富有起来，而代价是牺牲真正为那些公司工作的人。

entry.def: To enrich a nuclear fuel such as uranium means to increase the number of atoms of a particular kind in it, so that it can be used to produce more energy or a greater explosion.

example.ex: It was actually used for enriching uranium to weapons-grade levels.
example.tran: 实际上，它是用来将铀浓缩以制造武器。

means.word_mean: 1. make better or improve in quality;

sentences.sentence: "the oil boom enriched a lot of local people"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+title标题,头衔→v. 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+wrap包裹→v.包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注

Sentence.sentence: The liberal arts in higher education help enrich students' spiritual life.
They don't know their personal data enriches Facebook.
enrich his experience in medical research
But Bowman's supporters argue that Monsanto is trying to expand the scope of patents in ways that would enrich big corporations and hurt small farmers.
It will greatly enrich literary creation.

means.word_mean: 充实, 使丰富,使富含（某物）

sentences.en: Some cream will enrich the sauce.
sentences.cn: 在调味汁里加一些奶油会使其味道更加丰富。

jushi.english: Some cream will enrich the sauce.
jushi.chinese: 在调味汁里加一些奶油会使其营养更加丰富。
